text: Long Run is an unincorporated community in Craig Township, Switzerland County, in the U.S. state of Indiana. ==History== A post office was established at Long Run in 1874, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1907. ==Geography== Long Run is located at . ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Switzerland County, Indiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Indiana
title: Long Run, Indiana
